entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Banff
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Banff 08:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 07:32 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 07:32 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:32 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
